    1. InterfaceSetting()

Class InterfaceSetting

java.lang.Object
blackjack.vue.InterfaceSetting
public class InterfaceSetting extends Object
This class defines various interface settings such as window dimensions, fonts, and colors that are used across the game's graphical user interface.
